short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to use extension that will auto reload any webpage every 15 minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you ever need a webpage to stay as up-to-date as possible without needing to go through the hassle of going and reloading it every time the site has an update, this extension will automatically reload any webpage every 15 minutes whether there has been an update or not, to ensure that the site does stay up-to-date.
